title: Pole Bicycles resolve to do better, dropping stronger Remastered Stamina in True Gold
content:
Pole Bicycles have sent out a rather unusual press release, admitting to the brand’s past failings. Holding their hands up to mistakes made in relation to poor customer service and a media test of a prototype Stamina swing-arm that wasn’t quite up to standard, the PR reintroduces the company as Pole 2.0, a bicycle brand […]
